title: mystery champ
body: what happened to mystery champ? i cant find it in the store

replies.body: Yea it looks like that mystery champ token left the store when the Blue Essence Emporium went away. I'm going to ask around to see when/if they'll be coming back, but for now it does seem like they're gone.
Same, I don't see it. Hopefully its just turned off due to the gifts issues they're having.

Yes i cant see it either wtf is this.
And no i dont need just 10 champs or less so i should see it.
